channel.title: Leaked Call Of Duty : Black Ops (multi) - is it worth it?
channel.description: Well i played it a little bit. I didn't think much of it tbh. The fact that i can't quickscope kind of makes me mad. I like the idea that you can change your red dot sight to another little symbol though. There are so many ups and downs to this game. I havn't really gotten to a high level so if you have and want to talk about your exploits with an attachment or gun ect. . . Please tell the public because i don't think it is worth pre - ordering

Yea i understand that you can quick - scope like that, but real quick scoping is when you don’t look at the cross hairs on the actual sniper rifle scope good montage though i’m not that good because i have to use the keyboard haha!

item.title: Leaked Call Of Duty : Black Ops (multi) - is it worth it?
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:18, topic:367272”][quote author=k0 twin link=topic=463449.msg3390847#msg3390847 date=1288908080]

You can quick scope. its just a lot harder. all because josh doesn’t like quick scoping.

Well, it should be removed anyway, it’s dumb. Oh well.

Why should it be removed exactly…?

Besides the fact that it’s unrealistic. It’s a video game, if it was completely realistic it wouldn’t be fun.
[/quote]No quickscoping = no faggots complaining about “hardscopes” and saying everyone who doesn’t quickscope sucks.[/quote]

I guess that’s true. That shit does get annoying.

Read full topic

item.title: Leaked Call Of Duty : Black Ops (multi) - is it worth it?
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Mopar1 Mr Mopar
item.description:
@Mr_Mopar1 wrote:

I personally think that call of duty black ops will be 100x better than modern warfare 2.
-No quick scoping.
-Zombies
-Split screen online.
-Wager matches.
-So much customization.
-Great graphics.
-Mod tools for the PC.
-Some new multiplayer training mode.
-Alot of guns.
-Etc…

Read full topic
